title: UI design and patterns matching best in class - follow `docs/DESIGN_PROPOSAL.md`
description: We want to follow Linear.app and Monday.com as they are one of the best task management apps in the world. We want to mimic Monday's colorful style and palette, but we also want to improve on it. We want to match and improve on Linear's UX and controls.

features.title: Research and document Monday.com color palette and design tokens
features.description: Analyze Monday.com's colorful design system and document their color palette, including primary colors, secondary colors, status colors, and semantic color usage. Create a comprehensive color token system that captures their vibrant aesthetic while considering accessibility and contrast ratios. Document findings in a design tokens specification that can be implemented in CSS/Tailwind.

features.title: Research and document Linear.app UX patterns and interaction controls
features.description: Study Linear.app's user experience patterns, focusing on their clean interface design, keyboard shortcuts, task management flows, navigation patterns, modal behaviors, form controls, and micro-interactions. Document best practices for task creation, editing, status changes, and overall workflow efficiency. Create UX guidelines that can be applied to our task management application.

features.title: Implement Monday.com-inspired color system and theming
features.description: Create a comprehensive theming system based on Monday.com's colorful palette but with improvements. Update Tailwind configuration with custom color variables, implement CSS custom properties for dynamic theming, and create color utility classes. Ensure the color system supports light/dark modes and maintains accessibility standards while capturing Monday's vibrant aesthetic.

features.title: Redesign core UI components with Linear.app-inspired UX patterns
features.description: Refactor existing UI components (buttons, modals, forms, inputs, dropdowns) to follow Linear.app's clean and efficient interaction patterns. Implement consistent spacing, typography hierarchy, subtle animations, and intuitive keyboard navigation. Focus on reducing visual clutter while maintaining functionality and improving user efficiency.

features.title: Implement task management interface inspired by both platforms
features.description: Redesign the main task management interface combining Monday's colorful status indicators and visual hierarchy with Linear's clean layout and efficient workflows. Implement color-coded task statuses, priority indicators, drag-and-drop functionality, and streamlined task creation/editing flows. Ensure the interface feels both visually engaging and highly functional.

features.title: Create responsive navigation and sidebar inspired by Linear's layout
features.description: Redesign the application navigation and sidebar to match Linear's clean, collapsible sidebar design with clear hierarchy and efficient space usage. Implement smooth animations for expand/collapse states, keyboard navigation, and proper responsive behavior. Maintain Monday's colorful accent touches while achieving Linear's organizational clarity.

features.title: Implement advanced interaction patterns and micro-animations
features.description: Add sophisticated interaction patterns inspired by both platforms including hover states, loading animations, success/error feedback, smooth transitions between states, and contextual tooltips. Implement Linear-style keyboard shortcuts and Monday-style visual feedback for user actions. Focus on creating a polished, professional feel that exceeds both reference applications.

features.title: Create comprehensive design system documentation and component library
features.description: Document the complete design system including color palette, typography scales, spacing system, component usage guidelines, and interaction patterns. Create a living style guide that demonstrates all UI components and their variants. Ensure the design system is maintainable and extensible for future development while clearly showing improvements over the reference applications.
